title: Wednesday Post Show (6-9-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (6-9-21)
description:
Bobby talks about Chris Harrison officially leaving the Bachelor and whether or not it will survive without him. Bobby says why he wouldn’t host that show or even American Idol. A guy who broke the record for the most pushups in a year and why parents change the endings to stories when reading to their kids. Bobby also plays a voicemail he didn’t know if he could play during the radio show.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Bobby talks about Chris Harrison officially leaving the Bachelor and whether or not it will survive without him. Bobby says why he wouldn’t host that show or even American Idol. A guy who broke the record for the most pushups in a year and why parents change the endings to stories when reading to their kids. Bobby also plays a voicemail he didn’t know if he could play during the radio show.
